text:
@EricTrump @realDonaldTrump I think you're Dad should 100% still hold his rallies. His supporters are smart enough to all show up and cuddle up together.  Since the Coronavirus is fake news anyway.  Plus if they're worried, they can rinse their innatds with disinfectant afterwards.

Sounds good to me!
